text: "Through the Barricades" is a 1986 song by English new wave band Spandau Ballet and is the title track from their fifth studio album Through the Barricades. It went to number 1 in Italy, number 4 in the Netherlands, number 6 in the United Kingdom, number 7 in Norway, number 10 in Belgium and number 14 in Germany. It was their final top 10 hit in the United Kingdom. ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Spandau Ballet songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Through the Barricades (song)
